themes: perceived unfairness and bias in grant distribution
outsourcing of grant management to external organizations
need for broader local resident access to grants
role of intermediary organizations in connecting creative people and audiences
key_phrases: Outsourcing grants to the Long Center was a big mistake
Grants should go to as many local residents as possible
aCME could bring the needs of the creative people together with the needs of the arts consumers
barriers_identified: outsourcing grants to the Long Center
solutions_proposed: Grants should go to as many local residents as possible
aCME could bring the needs of the creative people together with the needs of the arts consumers
